channel.description: >[color=red]**Wedding Dress Mario - Neutral Killer**[/color] Trap (Passive): You will appear as a princess would to all investigative results, but you will appear as a neutral. So Long Gay Bowser (Day): Grab someone's tail at day, throwing them into the spiked bomb. This will make them unable to speak or hear anyone - 2 uses My Overalls ARE BLUE (Day): Appear blue dragon to any invest results for tonight - 2 uses Cappy (Night): Possess someone making you speak as them for the day and you remaining quiet. This will kill your target the next day if you possess someone else, if you don't possess. This will kill the current possessed and you will go back into your own body - Unlimited uses Fire Flower (Night): Burn someone, burning one of their visitors as well. Unable to be used until night 3. - 3 uses *Your objective is to kill all those who oppose this plumber* ![IMG_1541|383x384](upload://s6o5CDju7OrwBj021owSegN8uzH.JPG) *the most beautiful class portrait*

item.title: (Joke Class) Wedding Dress Mario | Get prepared for DMCA by Nintendo
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
Wedding Dress Mario - Neutral Killer
Trap (Passive): You will appear as a princess would to all investigative results, but you will appear as a neutral.
So Long Gay Bowser (Day): Grab someone’s tail at day, throwing them into the spiked bomb. This will make them unable to speak or hear anyone - 2 uses
My Overalls ARE BLUE (Day): Appear blue dragon to any invest results for tonight - 2 uses
Cappy (Night): Possess someone making you speak as them for the day and you remaining quiet. This will kill your target the next day if you possess someone else, if you don’t possess. This will kill the current possessed and you will go back into your own body - Unlimited uses
Fire Flower (Night): Burn someone, burning one of their visitors as well. Unable to be used until night 3. - 3 uses
Your objective is to kill all those who oppose this plumber

the most beautiful class portrait

Read full topic
item.source: (Joke Class) Wedding Dress Mario | Get prepared for DMCA by Nintendo
